author: ebrondol
body:
#### PR description:

- Extend CaloParticle validation in `HGCalValidator` and `makeHGCalValidationPlots` (including self-energy, energy sum per layer, first and last layer, ...)
- Remove CaloParticle validation in `CaloParticleValidation` (still PFvalidation is in the code, it will be restructured)
- Fix `--separate` option for 2D plots in `makeHGCalValidationPlots` 

#### PR validation:

- Results for 2 single pion files can be found [here](https://ebrondol.web.cern.ch/ebrondol/HGCal/addCaloPartValidation/20201201_vanilla_separate/) for vanilla release and [here](https://ebrondol.web.cern.ch/ebrondol/HGCal/addCaloPartValidation/20201207_fb990d2_separate/) for this branch
title: Update of HGCal validation of CaloParticle
